quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Study hard, for the well is deep, and our brains are shallow.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: What we learn with pleasure we never forget.
quotes.author: Alfred Mercier

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Walter Elliot

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Your limitationâ€”it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.text: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
quotes.author: Vaibhav Shah

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.text: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones that do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.text: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.text: The best time to learn is always now.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds are not limited.
quotes.author: Mortimer J. Adler

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie
